item.title: CSM Overview
item.description: CSM Overview This CSM Overview describes the Cray System Management ecosystem with its hardware, software, and network. It describes how to access these services and components. The CSM installation prepares and deploys a distributed system across a group of management nodes organized into a Kubernetes cluster which uses Ceph for utility storage. These nodes perform their function as Kubernetes master nodes, Kubernetes worker nodes, or utility storage nodes with the Ceph storage.
